effect.sun-moon: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.sun-moon: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
